name: Bee Token
description: Beeco is a financial solution for crypto users, designed to make the consumption of traditional goods and services easy, secure and with many added benefits. Bee Token is the original token of the Beeco ecosystem with the transaction symbol BGC. We are now in the first stage of building a decentralized e-commerce ecosystem where users can buy anything without the limitation of geography and currencies. They can use tokens to get a big discount, create e-voucher gifts and pay for other Beecoâ€™s services or stake tokens and save money while holding tokens with the leverage of blockchain.
